The nighttime shot of her gazing toward the illuminated castle indicates that she is looking towards a possible solution or resolution to her problems. The fact that she is standing in front of a castle, which could be symbolic of a place of power and guidance, suggests that she is preparing to meet with King Magnifico, who might hold the key to her problems or offer her a chance to make things right. This scene likely sets up the next stage of her journey where she will confront her challenges head-on and work towards finding a solution.
